StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: CREATE_TILLS_BANK_DEPOSITS
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE APEX.CREATE_TILLS_BANK_DEPOSITS (p_data IN CLOB)
AS

l_data varchar2(20000);
l_buffer varchar2(32767);
l_amount number;
l_offset number;

BEGIN
l_data := p_data;
--l_data := '[{"date":"2018-06-04T00:00:00","products":[{"saleSummaryID":1,"date":"2018-06-04T00:00:00","productId":"d06bd7ed-6fe1-4a36-9050-d49d36966b71","partNumber":"000001","title":"Product One","avgCostEx":4.5455,"avgCostTax":0.4546,"unit":"Each","totalUnits":1.000,"totalValueEx":18.1800,"totalValueTax":1.8200}]}]';

INSERT INTO BankDepositSummary (
BANKDEPOSITSDATE ,
RECEIPTNUMBER
)
SELECT *
FROM
JSON_TABLE(
l_data
, '$[*]' COLUMNS (
BANKDEPOSITSDATE varchar2(30) PATH '$.date',
NESTED PATH '$.bankDeposits[*]' COLUMNS (
ReceiptNumber varchar2(30) PATH '$.receiptNumber'
)

)
) JT;


INSERT INTO BankDepositSummaryLine (
BANKDEPOSITSDATE,
ReceiptNumber ,
CashAmount
)
SELECT *
FROM
JSON_TABLE(
l_data
, '$[*]' COLUMNS (
BANKDEPOSITSDATE varchar2(30) PATH '$.date',
NESTED PATH '$.bankDeposits[*]' COLUMNS (
RECEIPTNUMBER varchar2(30) PATH '$.receiptNumber',
CashAmount number PATH '$.cashAmount'
)

)
) JT;
COMMIT;
--
-- l_amount := 32000;
-- l_offset := 1;
--
-- begin
-- loop
-- dbms_lob.read( l_clob, l_amount, l_offset, l_buffer );
-- htp.p(l_buffer);
-- l_offset := l_offset + l_amount;
-- l_amount := 32000;
-- end loop;
-- exception
-- when no_data_found then
-- DBMS_OUTPUT.put_line('Message: unsuccessful operation');c v
-- when others then
-- DBMS_OUTPUT.put_line(SQLERRM);
-- end;

END;
